rows.label: qst711701_msg0001
rows.name:
Are you all perhaps a group
of Drivers and Blades, mo?

rows.label: qst711701_msg0002
rows.name:
I may not look it, but Gororo is
a Driver, mo. A combat pro, mo.

rows.label: qst711701_msg0003
rows.name:
Actually, I heard the next mission
is super dangerous, so I was
scouting for new comrades, mo.

rows.label: qst711701_msg0004
rows.name:
Hmm hmm... You all look promising,
mo. Gororo will test you, mo.

rows.label: qst711701_msg0007
rows.name:
I want you to topple any enemy 5
times with a Driver Combo, mo!

rows.label: qst711701_msg0008
rows.name:
To topple an enemy, first, the Driver
breaks the enemy with an Art...

rows.label: qst711701_msg0009
rows.name:
Then you have the Blade
attack to topple them, mo!

rows.label: qst711701_msg0010
rows.name:
Got it, mo? Break and then
topple... Repeat this 5 times, mo!

rows.label: qst711701_msg0011
rows.name:
Don't forget to report to
Gororo when you're done, mo!
